message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by both myself and you, making it a perfect match for your needs. To ensure we achieve a mutually beneficial transaction, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $11000. I believe this offer presents a great value for you while securing a competitive advantage for us. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
